import sys
import math

def main():
    num_lines = int(sys.stdin.readline())

    for line in sys.stdin:
        num = int(line)
        count = 0
        while num != reverseInt(num):
            count += 1
            num = num + reverseInt(num)
        print count, num

def reverseInt(i):
    res = 0
    j = 1
    l10 = int(math.floor(math.log10(i)))
    divisor = 10**l10
    while divisor >= 1:
        div = i / divisor
        res += div * j
        i = i % divisor
        divisor /= 10
        j *= 10
    return res

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
